Class BasicTestConfig

  • @Configuration
 @PropertySource(value="file:gradle.properties")
public class BasicTestConfig
extends com.marklogic.client.spring.BasicConfig
    Extends BasicConfig (from ml-javaclient-util) with test-specific properties.
